GSD.description:
fs/ntfs3: Add overflow check for attribute size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.17 by commit a1f0b873cf6ac1f00a749707d866494ed0708978. For more details please see the references link.
